name: explorer
description: This is the initial release of the Hyperledger explorer which provides a User Interface to explore and examine the current state of the Hyperledger blockchain in a convenient and easy to use manner. Similar to bitcoin explorers or crypto-currency explorers, information such as transaction information, network activity, recent blocks, visuals and search etc. are available that allows for information to be quickly found.

scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/hyperledgerpeerintf && npm install && cd ../../resources && ../node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && cd -

author: Mahesh Gutala
